frontmatter.title: Using Events and Delegates in Unity
lvalues and rvalues in C++
frontmatter.excerpt: Understanding lvalues and rvalues will give you more deeper understanding of C++. You will get better idea C++ move constructors, rvalue references, assignments, operators, and more.

frontmatter.title: The Workings of an Artificial Neural Network
frontmatter.excerpt: Artificial neural networks can be trained to do some amazing things, like recognizing faces, playing games, and so on. These tasks are very challenging, if not impossible, to do without using neural networks. This is a brief introduction into how artificial neural networks work.
